name: Moving Pink Pastel - Roblox
description:
- A pastel pink and purple theme made for Roblox. It is girly but that doesn't mean boys can't use it ^^
- Please don't send me a friend request because it actually annoys me a load but go onto my Stylish profile, it says some ways you can contact me and, well, you can also comment on this theme if you want! :)
- Don't be afraid to say if you don't like anything, I welcome ideas for improvement.
